content: Should any CDS Hooks mature from use of hooks in CRD?

CDS Hooks defines a Hook Maturity Model (similar to the FHIR maturity model), which indicates the amount of consensus and maturity of each individual hook -- resulting in a ballot and then normative status for each hook. The CDS WG is in the process of balloting the patient-view hook. Should additional hooks be considered for a greater maturity per the maturity model?

I don't know that we're at level 2+ for anything other than "order signed" from Connectathon testing. @Robert Dieterle, are you aware of whether the connectathons have tested any of the newer hooks (e.g. admission, discharge, etc.)?
I think that even a single step in maturity is important, and it's not surprising that order-sign has been used.

Hi Guys,
I wanted to know what kind of CRD order-review/order-sign request should be sent from provider to payer.
I looked up on the official github for Davinci CRD and it has a set of test cases...some with simply being a json object, while some being only a deviceRequest(ref: https://github.com/HL7-DaVinci/CRD/tree/master/examples/r4/order-review/documentation-required).

My question is: If am the intermediary, what test cases for CRD order sign should I support

It depends who you're an intermediary for and what sort of claims they accept - as well as what sort of actions your providers claim for. In theory, it could include CommunicationRequest, ServiceRequest, DeviceRequest, MedicationRequest, SupplyRequest, NutritionOrder and VisionPrescription
SInce for the December connectathon, Oxygen therapy is required, I guess we should focus on DeviceRequest. Please correct me if am wrong
That seems reasonable. To be honest, I'm not sure where the connectathon use-cases are - they should dictate. @Robert Dieterle ?
This is probably better answered by @Larry Decelles

@Lloyd McKenzie we used the "order-review" hook at 2 Connectathons and HIMSS in 2019. We used "medication-prescribe" at 1-2 Connectathons in 2019. Moving forward we plan to use some of the newer CDS Hooks as "order-review" is being deprecated.
@Lloyd McKenzie at this point I don't think "medication-prescribe" needs a higher maturity level.

Thanks, @Larry Decelles ! Also, note that 'med-prescribe' is deprecated in favor of the more accurate and implementable 'order-sign' and 'order-select' hooks.

As CRD advances, will y'all keep in mind that the maturity of hooks should also advance?
@Issac, I did not see medication-prescribe was being deprecated on https://cds-hooks.org/. Is this a recent announcement? Also, we'll keep in mind the advancing of the maturity of hooks.
